title: Parametric Design Learning Strategies: Utilizing Decision Tree Algorithms

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental design concepts and smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: A course learning parametric design principles through smartphone-based VR simulations in a limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can understand and design the basic principles of decision tree algorithms.
Learners can construct decision trees by analyzing parametric design attributes and test conditions.
Learners can perform simulations to solve new design problems by applying learned rules.

resources: Decision Tree Interactive Worksheet for Learning
Gear Reducer Layout Design Case Study Materials
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
